          <title>
            <string language="fr">Voir et entendre un orage</string>
            <string language="en">Seeing and hearing a thunderstorm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einen Thunderstorm sehen und hörend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vendo e ouvindo um thunderstorm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedendo e sentendo un thunderstorm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει και ακοή thunderstorm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viendo y oyendo una tempestad de truenos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière voyage plus rapidement que le bruit de sorte que nous voyons tout d'abord la foudre avant d'entendre le tonnerre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light travels faster than sound so that we see lightning first before we hear thunder.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Audition</string>
            <string language="en">Hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">foudre</string>
            <string language="en">lightning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vue</string>
            <string language="en">sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vitesse de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">speed of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vitesse du bruit</string>
            <string language="en">speed of sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">tonnerre</string>
            <string language="en">thunder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nuage orageux</string>
            <string language="en">thundercloud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orage</string>
            <string language="en">thunderstorm</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Licht schneller als 
Ton reist, damit wir Blitz zuerst sehen, bevor wir Donner hören.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz viaja mais 
rapidamente do que o som de modo que nós v o relâmpago primeiramente
antes que nós ouçamos o trovão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce viaggia 
più velocemente del suono in modo che vediamo il lampo in primo luogo
prima che sentiamo il tuono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ελαφριά ταξίδια 
γρηγορότερα από υγιή έτσι ότι βλέπουμε την αστραπή πρώτα
προτού να ακούσουμε τη βροντή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que viaja la luz más 
rápidamente que sonido de modo que veamos el relámpago primero antes
de que oigamos trueno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Blitz</string>
          </keyword>
